entry.title: 5 Days before my Deep Learning Nanodegree!
entry.content:
5 Days Before My Deep Learning Nanodegree in Udacity

I am excited about to learn more on Udacity with this nanodegree. 5 days before class begin, a mentor is assigned to me for the duration of the class. I am preping this course by finishing up Udacity's Linear Algebra Refreshing Course.

entry.title: Pelican How-To
entry.summary:

entry.content:
My Experience of Setting Up Pelican

So I was doing Udacity's machine learning nanodegree and in one of the lessons pelican was mentioned. Having never setted up a personal blog, I dipped into the nitty details and got some experience to make my own site on gihubpage with the help of some others who have already made the personal page with pelican
